casebody.data:
HERMAN O. ARMOUR et al., Plaintiffs and Appellants, v. THE MICHIGAN CENTRAL RAILROAD COMPANY, Defendant and Respondent.

Before Monell, Curtis, and Sedgwick, JJ.

Decided June 29, 1872. Appeal from judgment entered on report of referee, in favor of plaintiffs, on a contract of defendants as common carriers. Cotterrill Brothers, for appellants. C. A. Arthur, for respondent. Judgment affirmed.

No opinion delivered.
